original_title: O Resto da Tua Vida, A Peça
overview: A dialogue between Carlos Coutinho Vilhena and João André in which the two dispute theater and stand up, always giving the final verdict to the public. What do theater and stand up have in common and where do the two touch and merge? What is the difference between the two? This show aims to offer the public timeless texts that run through authors ranging from Shakespeare to Karl Valentin, giving them the version of an actor and a comedian.
title: O Resto da Tua Vida, A Peça
